Description:
A Lifestyle of Serenity
Poised in the bowl of a prestigious court, there is good reason this is a tightly-held pocket of Croydon Hills. Providing a lifestyle that combines pure comfort with practical living, this stylish home, over two levels, has been designed to capture the spectacular views of rolling green hills from almost every window; even the luxurious main bathroom where you'll relax in the spa and enjoy absolute serenity.
Multiple living areas will suit families from toddlers to teens, featuring; spacious lounge with Coonara providing an ambiance of warmth for treasured moments with family and friends, a downstairs rumpus/teen retreat with polished boards and wet bar, plus a separate meals zone serviced by a highly-functional kitchen comprising; electric oven, gas hotplates, dishwasher, much-needed cupboard space and tiled for easy maintenance. Cascading outside through a glass door, the covered decking wraps around the back of the home, showcasing every possible aspect of the beautiful surrounds - this is not just a home, but a way of life.
Three robed bedrooms offer a separate section for restful retreat from daily activities, including the master bedroom with full en-suite.
Other benefits to tantalise your senses are; gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double carport, storage, meticulously landscaped gardens and multiple fruit trees including; apricot, lemon, peach, lime, pear, apple, orange, mandarin and more.
Situated in a private and friendly neighbourhood, you'll enjoy close proximity to great schools, shops, parks, reserves and transport. The first step to realising your dream starts with an inspection!
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
Gloss, glamour, location
This stylishly renovated modern family home is the perfect entertainer. Galley style kitchen features gloss laminate bench tops, stainless steel appliances and meals area. Lounge and dining, three bedrooms all with built in robes, sleek and stylish family bathroom, separate toilet/powder room. Refrigerated air conditioning and heating plus key operated alarm system. The large undercover entertaining area overlooks the sparkling resort style solar heated in ground pool with spa. All of this, plus located in the highly sought after Croydon Hills area.

Description:
Warm & Welcoming
Nestled in the leafy vistas of a quiet court, this welcoming home abounds with warmth and comfort. An abundance of natural light and accommodating space ensures this is a place fit for a family. Savvy investors will also take an interest in the property, as it has been known to yield a great return on investment.
The bright interior offers a practical floorplan that separates the living areas from the sleeping quarters and comprises: an L-shaped lounge and dining; large, open-plan kitchen, meals and family domain; and 3 robed bedrooms serviced by the central bathroom and separate WC. The big back yard is a verdant wonder with loads of space to enjoy outdoor activities and fresh air.
This lovely home is located in easy reach of schools – Croydon Hills & Yarra Road Primary Schools, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar & Rudolf Steiner School – as well leafy parkland and public transport.

Description:
PERFECT FAMILY HOME ON A MASSIVE 991m2
Stepping into this 4BR brick veneer home, you will immediately feel relaxed and at home. Offering large open plan living with lounge / formal dining, large family room & open kitchen / meals area with new carpet and polished floor boards, this home is spacious yet very homely. The kitchen complete with Westinghouse oven & gas hot plates, d/washer & plenty of cupboard space including pantry all leads out onto a huge covered deck area overlooking a wonderful backyard perfect for kids of all ages, complete with a gorgeous gazebo and shed. The master bedroom has full ensuite with large vanity and walk in robe. The 2nd bedroom could also be used as a home office followed by another 2 bedrooms towards the rear of the house, giving you the privacy & space a young family desires. Gas ducted heating and split systems in master & living area and double remote garage plus room for the boat, caravan & trailer. Walking distance to Yarra Road & Croydon Hills Primary and Luther College, set in the most sought after area of Croydon Hills, a beautiful leafy position yet so close to everything you need including shops and transport. This home has everything you are looking for & more. Call for your inspection today.
Tony Smith : 0411 424 964

Address: 43 NARR MAEN DRIVE CROYDON HILLS VIC 3136
Description:
Step Up to Fashionable Family Living
Isn't it time your family enjoyed spacious, fashionable living? This beautifully renovated 4 bedroom brick veneer sanctuary is set in a coveted location and boasts three living areas for an easy lifestyle. Stunning landscaped gardens create wow-factor, while the light-infused interior boasts large windows with garden views. In the last few years this superbly styled home's been freshly painted, had a new kitchen, new carpets, new tiles, new downlights, and the roof's been re-sealed and re-pointed. Discover 4 bedrooms (BIRs) and a family bathroom; the privately-zoned master has an ensuite. Enjoy a gourmet kitchen showcasing s/s Blanco appliances, including 900mm oven. Relax beside the open fireplace in the chic lounge/dining room. A rumpus room is ideal for children/teens and a family/meals room with deck access is also inviting. An entertainer's deck and paved BBQ area will make entertaining a breeze. Children will love the spacious landscaped garden, which has a mulched area for equipment. Appointments: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2 sheds and remote lock up garage (sink and storage). Walk to Croydon Hills Primary, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, shops, reserves and bus; close to Eastland/EastLink. Act now!

Description:
Stylish Family Home - Superb Location
Sale by Negotiation
Nestled within a quiet no-thru road of esteemed Croydon Hills, this superior family home is highly functional and comprises quality appointments throughout. Whether you'll spend summer relaxing in the solar-heated pool (above ground), or hold dinner parties in the alfresco comprising a built-in barbeque (on mains gas), cafe blinds and ceiling fan, you'll quickly realise that every corner of this home has been fastidiously finished and will delight the senses. Featuring a spacious formal lounge and dining room, the floorplan is divided into two zones. The front of the home is devoted to parents with a study (optional 4th bedroom), master bedroom hosting a walk-in robe and full en-suite, and the rear of the home is equipped for children with two additional bedrooms featuring built-in robes and a light family bathroom. The second living zone is made up of an open plan style family area comprising an updated kitchen with walk-in pantry, dishwasher, wall oven and gas hot plates.
An emphasis has been placed on comfort for the whole family with inclusions such as; gas ducted heating, air-conditioning (lounge), split system air-conditioning (family room), double garage with remote entry and side access, quality security doors, canvass awnings and additional parking for guests.
You'll be saving the environment and your own pocket with two highly efficient 3300 litre water tanks with pump.
This north-facing home is further enhanced by well-tended lawns and gardens, all beautifully set behind a picket fence. The location is perfect for the busy family with all the local amenities at your fingertips; Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College (behind), Yarra Valley Grammar School, transport and reserves. An inspection will impress even the most discerning buyer.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
The Perfect Entertainer
Nestled in a whisper-quiet court location, this sprawling family home of sizeable proportions is the ideal entertainer and family haven.
Set amidst an established landscaped garden across two residential blocks, the property boasts tremendous street appeal with a definite 'wow' factor, while a superb interplay of light and space, create a most appealing home on the inside.
The spacious master bedroom is the ideal parent's retreat, boasting a large ensuite with bath and separate WC. The formal lounge and dining areas feature a gas log fire, cathedral ceilings and floor to ceiling windows overlooking a stunning IG swimming pool, while the property's elevated position ensures splendid views across the magnificent terraced garden to the surrounding bushland.
The quality craftsmanship and delightful views continue through to the light-filled kitchen, dining and adjacent living room with glass doors spilling out onto a superb alfresco area. There are 2 additional bedrooms (BIR) and a study together with a large central family bathroom.
The serene setting allows one to enjoy a healthy lifestyle balance away from the city hustle and bustle, with the benefit of major amenities including Yarra Road Primary, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and McAdam Square nearby.
Rarely does one have the opportunity to acquire such a fabulous property. Features also include GDH, an external store room and DLUG with internal access.
Mark Seeliger

Description:
Totally Tranquil
Nestled in a peaceful court and backing onto a verdant reserve, this home provides stylish living, marked by pervasive serenity. Providing easy access to Eastland and EastLink, and close to the cafes and shops of McCadam Sq, this enviable location is just one of its many impressive qualities.
Comprising of 3 bedrooms, open plan lounge/meals area with polished floorboards, and an updated kitchen, the home also offers the comforts of gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Externally there is a double remote garage, water tanks (3500L) with pump and a sprawling deck on which to entertain or relax on that peaceful Sunday morning. Featuring delightful landscaped gardens, multiple storage sheds and electric security gates, the home provides incredible outlooks as well as unbeatable functionality.

Description:
THE SECRET GARDEN
Enjoying a convenient location, this well presented 3 bedroom BV home offers to families and retirees of all ages.
A well designed floor plan boasts an abundance of natural light with garden views from all angles. Inside, the front of the home offers a formal lounge and master BR with ensuite whilst to the rear a 2nd living and dining room lead to 2 more robed bedrooms, a bathroom and laundry with outdoor access.
Both areas are separated by a spotless kitchen which overlooks the beautiful private garden.
Close to quality schools including Luther and Yarra Valley, Yarrunga Reserve and easy access to shops and public transport.
Additional features include space for dishwasher, gas cooking, cathedral ceilings, slate flooring, gas/electric heating, covered outdoor entertaining, double lock-up garage with single roller door at rear.
Be quick to view this gem!!

Address: 33 Croydon Hills Drive Croydon Hills VIC 3136
Description:
A Flawless Family Home
Complemented by the picturesque neighbourhood in which it is nestled, this home provides comfort and calm, underpinned by infallible style. With spacious living areas laid out to encourage harmonious family living, the home provides bright spaces, made brighter by the use of tasteful tones and polished floors.
Opening on to an exquisite formal lounge, the home is immediately impressive. Flowing on to the kitchen, this space provides a welcoming air, ideal for entertaining guests. Overlooking the meals area and down on to an expansive family area and stately open fire place, the richly coloured kitchen offers ample bench space and stainless steel appliances.
Featuring an immaculate bathroom complete with fine fittings and a luxurious spa bath, the sleeping quarters presents 4 generous bedrooms each with split system air conditioning. The main bedroom showcases WIR and a spectacular ensuite with frameless shower, while two of the additional bedrooms offer BIR.
Outside, a timber decking adjoins the family area, providing a covered entertaining space which offers full-view of the backyard and tan barked play area. Fully enclosed, the backyard features ample space for children and pets and provides access to the front of the home via a double lock-up car port.
Set within sought after Croydon Hills, the home offers proximity to reserves and walking tracks, and is moments from several schools including Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College.
Additional Features
Ducted Heating

Description:
THE PERFECT OPPORTUNITY
Everything about this intimately designed home ensures that the spaces will accommodate a growing family with ease, offering 3 bedrooms, a large family bathroom and a spacious lounge with a feature wood heater. The connecting kitchen and meals area provides ample space with modern comforts, including a stainless steel electric oven and an outlook to the rear deck which really provides the substance to this home. Partially covered and exposed, the deck would be brilliant any time of year to host a gathering or chill out with the family. There's plenty of yard too for young children to enjoy. Positioned in a one of the quietest streets in Croydon Hills, surrounded by a family friendly neighbourhood, there's also an array of schools which will appeal to families who require this option. Nearby, Good Shepherd Primary, Luther College, Yarra Valley and Croydon Hills Primary provide exceptional options, and with local bus services and access to McAdam Square shops, everything is within easy reach. The home is currently leased by tenants who would be willing to continue their lease (expires May 2012) should the property be purchased for investment purposes. Extras include: Air conditioning, gas heating and a single carport with a secure roller door.
* Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections

Description:
A Hidden Gem
You will be wonderfully surprised when you step inside and discover this hidden gem in the highly sought after Croydon Hills estate.
Nestled in a quite court location this well maintained brick veneer home comes complete with 3 robed bedrooms, the main has walk through dressing room to the ensuite effect bathroom and has a beautiful outlook to the peaceful atrium. The flowing family floor plan spoils you with 2 living areas of lounge and dining at the front off the formal entry and then beyond past the centrally located kitchen to the family and casual dining that is complimented with cracking wood fire making it the place to be for those winter months. Before we move outside we mustn't forget other internal features such as air conditioning, gas heating and open wood fire, high ceiling, feature walls, light filled interiors and a warm homely feel.
Step outside from the family room to discover your very own private garden oasis that is well established yet easy to maintain for anyone. The large paved pergola area running the length of the house will make entertaining a breeze for the largest of gatherings to the smallest of family BBQ's or casual outdoor dining.
There is plenty of off street parking under the double carport and car spaces in front.
All this is walking distance to the respected schools of Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther college, Good Sheppard and Croydon Hills primary, along with local parks and of course McAdam Square shopping centre with public transport.
This hidden gem won't last long, so be quick and book in your viewing today.

Description:
Immaculate One Owner Family Appeal
The spacious floorplan and immaculate presentation make this one owner brick veneer home ideal for Families and Investors. It's set on 859 sqm. (approx.) in a premier family pocket; just a short walk from Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Shepherd Primary and Croydon Hills Primary. Pristine landscaped gardens, a covered entrance and colonial-style windows create eye-catching appeal. The light, comfortable interior boasts 4 spacious bedrooms (3 with BIRs, 2 with ceiling fans), and a neat bathroom. The private master has an ensuite. Two separate living areas will make life easy. Discover a big lounge/dining room and a spacious family/meals area. The well-equipped open plan kitchen features a dishwasher. Outdoors a covered alfresco area is ideal for BBQ's, while children can play in the privacy of the beautiful landscaped backyard. The handyperson will love the x-large remote double lock-up garage with workshop and the big lock-up shed/workshop. It's all here for a fantastic family lifestyle, and you can further modernise it over time if you wish. Extras: ducted heating, 2 air-conditioners, alarm, side access for trailer and great storage. Walk to shops, reserves and transport, handy to Eastland and EastLink. A must-see!
* Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections
* To view our office profile, please click on Virtual Tour Link.

Address: 90 Croydon Hills Drive Croydon Hills VIC 3136
Description:
First Choice For Families
Directly overlooking the Yarrunga Reserve Wetlands, this stunning family home sits in the heart of the peaceful and elegant Croydon Hills Neighbourhood.
Expertly designed, this home has a beautifully flowing plan which allows for day-to-day comfort as well as effortless entertaining. The large kitchen which provides ample cupboard space streams seamlessly into a generous family and dining area, overlooking the self-contained spa, good-sized yard with tan-barked play space and covered entertaining area.
The main bedroom, complete with walk-in robes and ensuite provides unobstructed views of the wetlands and combines with the formal lounge to create the ultimate parents’ retreat, separate from the communal areas of the house. The generous, remaining bedrooms are clustered around an immaculately appointed bathroom at the opposite end of the home allowing for children to play boisterously while peace and quiet is maintained elsewhere.
The front garden is beautifully landscaped to match the home’s natural surrounds, making it appear nestled amongst the native flora. Complete with ducted vacuum, self-cleaning Blanco oven and internal wiring for a home theatre system, the home makes maintenance simple.
Close to quality schools including Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Shepherd and Croydon Hills Primary, and just minutes from a variety of shops, the location provides everyday convenience.
Additional Features:
Ducted evaporative cooling
Ducted heating
Alarm system
Double garage with remote access
Split system air conditioning (in formal lounge)
Internal garage access

Description:
This Is Living!
Featuring immaculate presentation and a well-executed floorplan, this centrally located three bedroom home will make a super smart investment or an absolutely fantastic family home. Boasting a central entrance that cleverly divides two spacious living zones - on the right a comfortable and sunny lounge room sweeps through to a formal dining area, while on the left an open plan living area encompasses a bright kitchen, fully equipped with dishwasher, good cupboard space, huge walk-in pantry and breakfast bar. With room for family meals and relaxation, there’s also a clever study nook with inbuilt library. Ample windows provide natural light and a pleasant outlook to an expansive merbau deck and established trees, partially covered and featuring an undercover clothesline, this space is the first element of a truly remarkable rear yard. Pristine lawn and garden paths are framed by beautiful cottage style flowerbeds and lead to herb gardens, veggie patches and the garden shed. Bedroom accommodation is truly generous. The downstairs master has full ensuite, walk-in robe and air-conditioning unit. A spiral timber staircase leads to an upstairs retreat, featuring a sitting room, another grand sized master with spacious ensuite and an abundance of robes, plus a third, roomy and robed bedroom. With the comfort of gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and the practicality of a double carport with rear access to accommodate boat or trailer and extra off-street parking, this family home is matched by a fabulous neighbourhood, all within close proximity to well-renowned schools, shopping and transport facilities, parks and reserves. This residence will thrill, so book your inspection today.
Maree Slade : 0419 519 282
